type.name: file_alias_identification_item
type.description: A file_alias_identification_item extends alias identification to document_file instances.

entity.name: document_file
entity.description: A document_file is of type document and of type characterized_object and characterizes files with properties, e.g. file size, creating system, etc.

where.label: WR1
where.description: the name of the characterized_object shall not be used, use name of document.

where.label: WR2
where.description: the description of the characterized_object shall not be used, use name of document.

where.label: WR3
where.expression: SIZEOF( QUERY( drt <* SELF\document.representation_types | drt.name IN ['digital','physical'] )) = 1
where.description: the document_file shall have exactly one document_representation_type with a name of either 'digital' or 'physical'.
